content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteNetworkPolicy path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/ipam/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/network_policies/{network_policy_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name networkpolicyid
desc an edgecompute network policy id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete a policy
responses
title: 15_Network Policies_DeleteNetworkPolicy_85.json
